last_episode_to_air.name: Crab and Toshikoshi Soba
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's never too late for a fresh start. One year ends and another begins as familiar faces gather to celebrate New Year’s Eve at the Midnight Diner.

name: Midnight Diner: Tokyo Stories
overview: In an otherwise mundane diner open from midnight to 7 a.m., there is no menu – but the chef cooks anything his customers want. Each episode is about different a different customer, as they find simple yet profound connections with one another based on their shared love of a particular dish.

episodes.name: Tan Men
episodes.overview: A specially prepared bowl of tanmen noodles leads a radio announcer to discover a secret about a beloved television show from his youth.

episodes.name: Corn Dog
episodes.overview: A childish fight over a fish-sausage corn dog leads to a schism between an Asakusa comedian and his now-famous former assistant.

episodes.name: Tonteki
episodes.overview: An office worker who loves pork steaks knits sweaters for the men she adores, but her affections – and handiwork – are not always appreciated.

episodes.name: Omelette Rice
episodes.overview: The shared love of fried rice omelets forms an intercultural bridge between a young Japanese physicist and a Korean girl.

episodes.name: Egg Tofu
episodes.overview: A lonely little boy with only a gambler to take care of him hopes to make a connection with a bar girl over a mutual appreciation for egg tofu.

episodes.name: Umeboshi and Plum Wine
episodes.overview: Upon finishing the last of his late mother's pickled plums, a man suddenly wonders what will become of his erotica after he passes away.

episodes.name: Hot Pot for One
episodes.overview: A diner regular reunites with an old classmate who, despite a good upbringing, now works a menial job to support her troublesome nephew.

episodes.name: Sautéed Yam
episodes.overview: A dish of sauteed Chinese yam rekindles the connection between a young wife and her former lover, with whom she shares a hidden professional past.

episodes.name: Ham Cutlet
episodes.overview: A breaded ham cutlet brings back an elderly lawyer's memories of playing the board game Othello with his long-lost younger brother.

episodes.name: New Year's Eve Noodles, Again
episodes.overview: As December comes to a close and the regulars gather at the diner, the Master takes a look back at his memories of the year.

episodes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
episodes.overview: Game designer Akai grew up in an orphanage. He finds solace in a chicken rice dish that also holds the key to reconnecting with his birth mother.

episodes.name: Fried Chicken Breast with Cheese
episodes.overview: Writer Yada and hostess Hikaru bond over their love of horoscopes and chicken cheese cutlet. Secretly, Yada tries to use the horoscopes to woo her.

episodes.name: Plum Rice Ball
episodes.overview: A retired old schoolteacher reconnects with his former student: diner regular Marilyn. Awkwardly, her high school nemesis also shows up.

episodes.name: Fried Chicken Wings
episodes.overview: In her mid-30s, Chizuru worries her modeling career is ending. An encounter with a high-powered fan gives her a chance to evaluate her priorities.

episodes.name: Yakisoba Dog
episodes.overview: Businessman Kotani is jubilant at his high school baseball team's success. His joy stirs up memories of his former best friend, the coach of the team.

episodes.name: Salmon and Mushrooms
episodes.overview: The Ueharas run a barbershop together. They seem happy, but when his wife goes on a trip, a beautiful kimono instructor catches Mr. Uehara's eye.

episodes.name: Kitsune Udon
episodes.overview: Two aspiring voice actresses stop by for lucky bowls of kitsune udon, but six months later, only one of them seems to have had any luck.

episodes.name: Curry Ramen
episodes.overview: A pachinko parlor employee and the middle school classmate he idolized seem to reconnect over curry ramen, but appearances can be deceiving.

episodes.name: Sweet Rolled Omelet
episodes.overview: A Mr. Lee shows up nightly, ordering rolled omelets every time. He turns out to be a film director fleeing from his own set and his father's legacy.

episodes.name: Crab and Toshikoshi Soba
episodes.overview: It's never too late for a fresh start. One year ends and another begins as familiar faces gather to celebrate New Year’s Eve at the Midnight Diner.
